page.title: 08A Patient In Hospital.
page.content: In April, 1984 my doctor made me an appointment to go into hospital. I had to have an operation on my ear to put a grommet in. Near where I slept there was an inside play area with a climbing frame, a slide, two gymnasium bars, a grand piano and a television room. Before I had my operation I had to get changed into a white gown. I was given a pink tablet in a glass of water - soon, I fell asleep. When I woke up I felt hungry, a nurse came in and asked me if I wanted some Rice Krispies. Half way through eating them my mum came . When I had finished my mum went home. Later on I felt sick. Some nurses asked what was wrong, then I was sick. The day after my operation I went home.
